
add_custom_command (
  OUTPUT  VRgbEncoder8to10.cpp
          VRgbEncoder8to10.h
          VRgbEncoder8to10__Syms.cpp
          VRgbEncoder8to10__Syms.h
  DEPENDS RgbEncoder8to10.v
  COMMAND perl ${VERILATOR} ${VERILATOR_OPTS} -Mdir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR} -cc
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/RgbEncoder8to10.v
)

# Verilog .v files are added here so that they get added to any IDE project generated by CMake.
add_library (VRgbEncoder8to10 STATIC VRgbEncoder8to10.cpp VRgbEncoder8to10__Syms.cpp
    RgbEncoder8to10.v
)

target_compile_options(VRgbEncoder8to10 PRIVATE ${VK_CPPFLAGS})

target_include_directories(VRgbEncoder8to10 PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})

target_link_libraries(VRgbEncoder8to10 verilated)
